title: Aeditor / APP
subtitle: Aeditor
header: Welcome to the future of beauty!
Aedit app lets you to find the best providers in your area, get an insider’s perspective on all beauty procedure options, and instantly book your consultation.

content.header: Aeditor is taking the stigma out of plastic surgery, cosmetic procedures and injectables.
paragraphs: With Aeditor you can do a lot of great things – just take a picture and apply a cosmetic treatment of your choice to a selected area (nose, lips or brows). You can refresh your face with just a few taps and swipes, compare your before & after, save your AEDITs and share them with your friend.

content.header: Aeditor is the only medically approved app that gives you a realistic idea of what you would look like after cosmetic treatments.
paragraphs: Working with the AEDIT team has been a great experience as these guys are really pushing the cosmetics surgery industry forward by creating seamless and aesthetically appealing mobile experience utilizing the latest technological advancements.
